title: InfluxDB API Statistics
description:
## InfluxDB API Statistics

Represents the request rates, latencies, and responses of the InfluxDB API, used to read and write data to and from InfluxDB.

- [InfluxDB API Documentation](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/api-guide/)
- [InfluxDB API Reference](https://docs.influxdata.com/influxdb/v2.3/reference/api/)

definition.title: API Request Count by Response Code
Request Duration by Lower Bound, Path
